act_info.full_title: Interim Appropriation for 2015-2016 Act, 2015, S.O. 2015, c. 20, Sched. 18
act_info.citation: Interim Appropriation for 2015-2016 Act, 2015, S.O. 2015, c. 20, Sched. 18

content.content: 1. Expressions used in this Act have the same meaning as in the Financial Administration Act unless the context requires otherwise.
content.raw_html: 1. Expressions used in this Act have the same meaning as in the Financial Administration Act unless the context requires otherwise.

content.content: 2. Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2016, amounts not exceeding a total of $121,429,265,700 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund or recognized as non-cash expenses to be applied to the expenses of the public service that are not otherwise provided for.
content.raw_html: 2. Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2016, amounts not exceeding a total of $121,429,265,700 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund or recognized as non-cash expenses to be applied to the expenses of the public service that are not otherwise provided for.

content.content: 3. Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2016, amounts not exceeding a total of $4,810,157,000 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund or recognized as non-cash investments to be applied to the investments of the public service in capital assets, loans and other investments that are not otherwise provided for.
content.raw_html: 3. Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2016, amounts not exceeding a total of $4,810,157,000 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund or recognized as non-cash investments to be applied to the investments of the public service in capital assets, loans and other investments that are not otherwise provided for.

content.content: 4. Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2016, amounts not exceeding a total of $210,137,600 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund to be applied to the expenses of the Legislative Offices that are not otherwise provided for.
content.raw_html: 4. Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2016, amounts not exceeding a total of $210,137,600 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund to be applied to the expenses of the Legislative Offices that are not otherwise provided for.

content.content: 5. All expenditures made or recognized under this Act must be charged to the proper appropriation following the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2016. 6. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 7. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). ______________  Français
content.raw_html:
5. All expenditures made or recognized under this Act must be charged to the proper appropriation following the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2016.

6. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act).

7. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).
